node.address: Getsemani Calle la Sierpe No 29-03 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
You'll find the hostel nestled in a corner of the historic and culturally rich, Calle de la Sierpe, which snakes it's way from the bustle of Plaza Trinidad all the way to Parque Centenario in Getsemani.

The hostel offers you free breakfast, wifi, Computers, the TV with an X-Box and a very well equiped kitchen. If you have questiones about the city or tours the stuff will always be there for you!

The hostel finds itself located in walking distance to all touristic attractions, like the historic Center, the always buzzy Plaza de la Trinidad, the Beach and Castle.

Located in Cartagena de Indias and with San Felipe de Barajas Castle reachable within less than 1 km, Mama Waldy Hostel features a tour desk, rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
At the hostel, every room is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.
An American breakfast is available daily at Mama Waldy Hostel.
At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub.
Cartagena's Walls is 2.2 km from Mama Waldy Hostel, while Bolivar Park is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from the hostel.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: Come in from the cold (especially if you've just done the overnight bus from Bogotá to Cartagena) with a warm stay with Mama Waldy - the family run Cartagena hostel with heaps of heart. Named after the family matriarch, the much loved abuela (grandma) Waldy, this Getsemani hostel is as close as you will find to a home from home in Cartagena.
